Title: Makes certain liquor license fees payable in installments
Summary: Makes certain liquor license fees payable in installments; reduces the fee for certain types of licenses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to making certain liquor license fees payable in installments; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof
